meta.note: 0–5 天共識使用 normalized.json 中所有可用來源；溫度優先 HKO，否則取其他首個數值。

rows.text: Slight flooding will occur in Inner Harbour area from 9 pm ~ 0 am due to astronomical tide. Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches. Force 5 to 6 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.

Slight flooding will occur in Inner Harbour area from 9 pm ~ 0 am due to astronomical tide. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 4 to 5 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
